sentence: The pasture regularly conducts veterinary medicine inventory to determine the use, inventory, and amount of incoming medicine to ensure that veterinary medicine are used accurately with detailed classifications.

Managing Veterinary Medicine6 our laboratories have obtained ac - creditation from the China National Accreditation Service for Conformity Assessment (CNAS) 12 FAPAS determine the capabilities of food testing and analysis laboratories can verify inspection methods for chemical components, microorganisms, etc., in food items such as meat, edible oils, baby food, vegetables, and so on.
If any abnormality is found during these inspections, we immediately investigate any deviations, and determine the best disposal plan to legally dispose of non-conforming products.
